description: A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suit or the capital A in the center of the face, there's a picture of a soldier mid-strike of their fist at an invisible opponent, and an arrow pointing up next to it in a corner.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there is a pictogram of a head struck by a simplistic depiction of a lightning, with an shield next to the scene.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there is a pictogram of a pair of binoculars, and an electronic chip next to it in a corner.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there is a picture of a police baton leaving a trail as it arches down and to the right, with a symbol of a speaker emitting little noise next to it in a corner.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there is a pictogram of a pair of binoculars, and a set of tendrils crawling out of a dark hole next to it in a corner.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there is a pictogram of a stomach, with an arrow pointing down next to it.
A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there is a picture of a muscle cuirass and a pistol laid over it.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there is a pictogram of a pair of binoculars, and a brain next to it in a corner.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there is a picture of a full-body environment suit and a snowflake laid over it.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there is a picture of a full-body environment suit and the sun laid over it.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there is a pictogram of a water bottle, with an arrow pointing down next to it.

A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there is a pictogram of a pair of binoculars, and a humanoid creature leaving a trail next to it in a corner.
A white playing card with an elaborate pattern of white lines on the red back.  Instead of the suits in the center of the face, there's a pictogram of an open eye.
